ny: Mikhalidwe yachimuna mwa mkazi imawonedwa kukhala mphamvu, pamene kuli kwakuti mikhalidwe yachikazi mwa mwamuna imalingaliridwa kukhala yofooka.

en: The graphic description of the victim's murder was too much for his mother, who ran out of the court in tears.
ny: Mafotokozedwe owonekera bwino a kuphedwa kwa wophedwayo anali ochuluka kwambiri kwa amayi ake, omwe anathawa m'khoti akulira.

en: Even though Tom told Mary about his problem, he didn't want to listen to any advice she had on how to solve it.
ny: Ngakhale kuti Tom anauza Mary za vuto lake, sanafune kumvera malangizo alionse amene anali nawo okhudza mmene angathetsere vutoli.

en: I realize I may not be the most desirable man in the world, but I still hope you'll consider going out with me.
ny: Ndikuzindikira kuti mwina sindine munthu wokhumbika kwambiri padziko lapansi, koma ndikuyembekezabe kuti mungaganizire kupita nane kocheza nane.

en: In preparation for painting a portrait, my friend takes many photographs in order to study the subject closely.
ny: Pokonzekera kujambula chithunzi, mnzanga amatenga zithunzi zambiri kuti aphunzire nkhaniyi mosamala.

en: Life would be infinitely happier if we could only be born at the age of eighty and gradually approach eighteen.
ny: Moyo ukanakhala wachimwemwe kwambiri ngati tingabadwe kokha pa msinkhu wa zaka makumi asanu ndi atatu ndi kuyandikira pang'onopang'ono zaka khumi ndi zisanu ndi zitatu.

en: People often lie about what they did on the weekend, so their friends won't realize how boring they really are.
ny: Nthawi zambiri anthu amanama pa zimene anachita kumapeto kwa mlungu, choncho anzawo sangazindikire kuti ndi otopetsa kwambiri.

en: Something you should know about me is that my greatest fear in life is that people will find out that I'm poor.
ny: Chinthu chomwe muyenera kudziwa za ine ndi chakuti mantha anga aakulu kwambiri m'moyo ndikuti anthu adzapeza kuti ndine wosauka.

en: Tom pressed his ear against the wall to see if he could hear what his parents were discussing in the next room.
ny: Tom anakanikiza khutu lake pakhoma kuti aone ngati angamve zimene makolo ake anali kukambirana m'chipinda chotsatira.

en: Tom was obsessed by the belief that, one by one, everyone around him was being abducted and replaced by aliens.
ny: Tom anali wotanganitsidwa ndi chikhulupiriro chakuti, mmodzi ndi mmodzi, aliyense womuzungulira anali kuba ndi kuloŵedwa m'malo ndi alendo.

en: I know that it is highly unlikely that you'd ever want to go out with me, but I still need to ask at least once.
ny: Ndikudziwa kuti n'zokayikitsa kwambiri kuti mungafune kupita nane kunja, koma ndikufunikirabe kufunsa kamodzi.

en: Acting on advice from his astronomers, Alexander the Great decided not to attack Egypt and went to India instead.
ny: Pochitapo kanthu pa malangizo ochokera kwa akatswiri ake a zakuthambo, Alexander Wamkulu anasankha kuti asawukire Igupto ndipo m'malo mwake anapita ku India.

en: I came here to see if there was something I could do to help, but there doesn't seem to be anything for me to do.
ny: Ndinabwera kuno kudzaona ngati panali chinachake chimene ndingachite kuti ndithandize, koma zikuoneka kuti palibe chimene ndingachite.

en: I know you're upset about your car being totaled, but you weren't injured and you should be thankful to be alive.
ny: Ine ndikudziwa inu mwakhumudwa za galimoto yanu kukhala totaled, koma inu simunavulale ndipo muyenera kuyamikira kukhala ndi moyo.

en: The World Health Organization says alcohol abuse is the third leading cause of death and disability in the world.
ny: Bungwe Loona za Umoyo pa Dziko Lonse linanena kuti kumwa mowa mopitirira muyeso ndi chinthu chachitatu chomwe chimachititsa imfa ndi kulumala padziko lonse.

en: Babies can become dehydrated from a high fever, so I was told that it would be better to send him to the hospital.
ny: Makanda akhoza kuchepa madzi m'thupi chifukwa cha kutentha thupi kwakukulu, choncho ndinauzidwa kuti zingakhale bwino kumutumiza kuchipatala.

en: Did you know that in Japan, if you have a tattoo, you won't be allowed to bathe in many of the hot spring resorts?
ny: Kodi mukudziwa kuti ku Japan, ngati muli ndi tattoo, simudzaloledwa kusamba m'malo ambiri otentha a masika?

en: Everybody has a right to his own opinion. However, sometimes it's better not to tell anybody what that opinion is.
ny: Aliyense ali ndi ufulu wokhala ndi maganizo ake. Komabe, nthawi zina ndi bwino kuti musauze aliyense maganizo amenewo.

en: The Himalayas were formed by the collision of the tectonic plates of India and Eurasia about 50 million years ago.
ny: Mapiri a Himalaya anapangidwa ndi kugundana kwa mbale za tectonic za India ndi Eurasia zaka pafupifupi 50 miliyoni zapitazo.

en: The police can't find a single person who remembers seeing you where you said you were on the night of the murder.
ny: Apolisi sangapeze munthu mmodzi yemwe akukumbukira kukuwonani komwe munati munali usiku wakupha.

en: Tom likes Mary, but Mary likes John. To make matters even more interesting, John likes Alice, but Alice likes Tom.
ny: Tom amakonda Mariya, koma Mariya amakonda Yohane. Kuti zinthu zikhale zosangalatsa kwambiri, John amakonda Alice, koma Alice amakonda Tom.

en: Tom was sad when he discovered that Mary was a gold digger and Mary was sad when she discovered that Tom was poor.
ny: Tom anamva chisoni atazindikira kuti Mariya anali wokumba golide ndipo Mary anali wachisoni atazindikira kuti Tom anali wosauka.

en: What kind of a parent would leave their child unattended in the car outside the pub while they're inside drinking?
ny: Kodi ndi kholo lotani limene lingasiye mwana wawo wosasamalidwa m'galimoto kunja kwa pub pamene ali mkati akumwa?

en: Witnesses told police that the train was travelling way over the speed limit when it derailed going around a bend.
ny: Mboni zinauza apolisi kuti sitimayo inali kuyenda m'njira yopitirira malire a liŵiro pamene inatuluka panjanji kuzungulira mphambano.

en: The Belo Monte dam in Brazil is a controversial project because of its impact on the environment and native people.
ny: Damu la Belo Monte ku Brazil ndi ntchito yotsutsa chifukwa cha zotsatira zake pa chilengedwe ndi anthu amtundu.

en: Tom's constant arguing irritates some of his classmates. However, most of the class has just learned to ignore him.
ny: Kukangana kosalekeza kwa Tom kumakwiyitsa anzake ena a m'kalasi. Komabe, ambiri a m'kalasimo angophunzira kumunyalanyaza.

en: How's the trouble and strife? is an example of a sentence using Cockney rhyming slang. It means "How's your wife?"
ny: Kodi mavuto ndi ndewu zili bwanji? ndi chitsanzo cha chiganizo pogwiritsa ntchito Cockney rhyming slang. Zimatanthauza kuti "Kodi mkazi wako ali bwanji?"

en: Getting your message across is much more important than trying to say it exactly like a native speaker would say it.
ny: Kupeza uthenga wanu kudutsa n'kofunika kwambiri kuposa kuyesa kunena izo ndendende ngati wokamba mbadwa anganene izo.

en: Over 100 tons of dust and sand-sized particles bombard the earth every day from space, most of which goes unnoticed.
ny: Matani oposa 100 a fumbi ndi tinthu ta mchenga timaponya dziko lapansi tsiku lililonse kuchokera kumwamba, zomwe zambiri sizidziwika.

en: The typical elements of a foreign culture are changed into the typical elements of the local culture of translators.
ny: Mbali zenizeni za chikhalidwe chachilendo zimasinthidwa kukhala zinthu zenizeni za chikhalidwe cha omasulira akumaloko.

en: Tom tried to sell his old VCR instead of throwing it away, but no one would buy it, so he ended up throwing it away.
ny: Tom anayesa kugulitsa VCR yake yakale m'malo moitaya, koma palibe amene angagule, choncho anamaliza kuitaya.

en: A man touched down on the moon. A wall came down in Berlin. A world was connected by our own science and imagination.
ny: Munthu wina anafika pamwezi. Khoma linagwa ku Berlin. Dziko linagwirizanitsidwa ndi sayansi yathu ndi malingaliro athu.

en: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect, but rather that you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
ny: Kukhala wosangalala sikutanthauza kuti zonse zili zangwiro, koma m'malo mwake mwaganiza zoyang'ana kuposa kupanda ungwiro.

en: Dr. Zamenhof believed that a language belongs to the people who speak it which is why he never copyrighted Esperanto.
ny: Dr. Zamenhof ankakhulupirira kuti chinenero ndi cha anthu omwe amalankhula ndi chifukwa chake sanaitanirepo Esperanto.

en: Every student who has graduated from our university has studied English with a native speaker for at least two years.
ny: Wophunzira aliyense amene wamaliza maphunziro ku yunivesite yathu waphunzira Chingelezi ndi wokamba nkhani wakwawo kwa zaka zosachepera ziwiri.

en: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.
ny: Ngati simukufuna kuvala dzuwa, ndilo vuto lanu. Basi musabwere kudandaula kwa ine mukapsa ndi dzuwa.

en: It took Tom several hours to assemble a bunk bed that the instructions said would take less than an hour to assemble.
ny: Kunatengera Tom maola angapo kusonkhanitsa bedi lalikulu limene malangizowo ananena kuti lidzatenga nthaŵi yosakwana ola limodzi kusonkhana.

en: Nobody has asked you to agree, but can't you at least accept that there are people who hold different views from you?
ny: Palibe amene wakupemphani kuti muvomereze, koma kodi simungavomereze kuti pali anthu amene ali ndi malingaliro osiyana ndi inu?

en: Tom didn't know the meaning of "anglophobia," so he did a quick web search to see if he could find out what it meant.
ny: Tom sanadziwe tanthauzo la "anglophobia," choncho anachita kufufuza mwamsanga pa intaneti kuti aone ngati angapeze tanthauzo lake.

en: Even though computer programmers may use semicolons every day, nowadays most people only use semicolons for emoticons.
ny: Ngakhale kuti olemba mapulogalamu apakompyuta angagwiritse ntchito semicolons tsiku lililonse, masiku ano anthu ambiri amangogwiritsa ntchito semicolons kwa emoticons.

en: I had never eaten any kind of Thai food, so I was pretty excited about going to a Thai restaurant with my grandmother.
ny: Ndinali ndisanadyepo mtundu uliwonse wa chakudya cha ku Thailand, choncho ndinasangalala kwambiri kupita ku lesitilanti ya ku Thailand ndi agogo anga aakazi.

en: The room didn't look very good after Tom painted it, because he didn't even bother to wash the walls or ceiling first.
ny: Chipindacho sichinawoneke bwino kwambiri pambuyo poti Tom adachijambula, chifukwa sanavutike ngakhale kutsuka makoma kapena denga poyamba.

en: When does your sister come back from work? "I don't know, but I think she'll arrive at home a few minutes before me."
ny: Kodi mlongo wanu amabwera liti kuchokera kuntchito? "Sindikudziwa, koma ndikuganiza kuti adzafika kunyumba mphindi zingapo ine ndisanafike."

en: Four of my favorite Christmas carols are "Silent Night," "Joy to the World," "The First Noel" and "Away in the Manger."
ny: Nyimbo zinayi zomwe ndimakonda kwambiri za Khirisimasi ndi "Usiku Wachete," "Chimwemwe ku Dziko," "The First Noel" ndi "Away in the Manger."

en: My friend recommended that I shouldn't buy an iPad yet, but to wait until I see what Apple's competitors come out with.
ny: Mnzanga analimbikitsa kuti sindiyenera kugula iPad komabe, koma kudikira mpaka nditawona zomwe mpikisano wa Apple umatuluka nawo.

en: Roger Miller entered the United States Army at the age of seventeen. He was sent to an army base near Atlanta, Georgia.
ny: Roger Miller analowa m'gulu lankhondo la United States ali ndi zaka khumi ndi zisanu ndi ziwiri. Anatumizidwa ku malo a asilikali pafupi ndi Atlanta, Georgia.

en: A trade delegation has gone to Japan ahead of the Prime Minister to crunch the numbers with their Japanese counterparts.
ny: Nthumwi ya zamalonda yapita ku Japan patsogolo pa Nduna Yaikulu kukasokoneza ziŵerengerozo ndi anzawo a ku Japan.

en: Anyone whose comfort level depends on what someone else is wearing really needs to take a long, hard look at themselves.
ny: Aliyense amene chitonthozo chake chimadalira pa zimene munthu wina akuvala amafunikira kwenikweni kudziyang'ana kwa nthaŵi yaitali.

en: I think it's highly unlikely that Tom was not aware that he wouldn't be allowed to enter the museum without his parents.
ny: Ndikuganiza kuti n'zokayikitsa kwambiri kuti Tom sankadziwa kuti sangaloledwe kulowa m'nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale popanda makolo ake.

en: I was lucky that the policeman didn't give me a ticket for making a U-turn at an intersection that had a no U-turn sign.
ny: Ndinali ndi mwayi kuti wapolisi sanandipatse tikiti yopanga U-turn pa mphambano yomwe inalibe chizindikiro cha U-turn.

en: Tom isn't your average guy. He doesn't like things most guys like and he doesn't like to do things most men enjoy doing.
ny: Tom si munthu wanu wamba. Iye sakonda zinthu zimene anyamata ambiri amakonda ndipo sakonda kuchita zinthu zimene amuna ambiri amasangalala kuchita.

en: Cesar Chavez asked that strikers remain non-violent even though farm owners and their supporters sometimes used violence.
ny: Cesar Chavez adapempha kuti omenyera nkhondo akhalebe opanda chiwawa ngakhale eni mafamu ndi othandizira awo nthawi zina amagwiritsa ntchito chiwawa.

en: Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.
ny: Ngakhale tsopano, nthawi zina ndimaganiza kuti ndikufuna kukuwonani. Osati inu amene muli lero, koma inu amene ndimakumbukira kuchokera kale.

en: We should spend our time creating content for our website rather than wasting time worrying about minor cosmetic details.
ny: Tiyenera kuthera nthawi yathu kulenga zili webusaiti yathu m'malo kutaya nthawi nkhawa mfundo zazing'ono zodzikongoletsera.

en: A lot of people who have up until now been spending money having a good time now need to be more careful with their money.
ny: Anthu ambiri amene mpaka pano akhala akuwononga ndalama akusangalala tsopano ayenera kusamala kwambiri ndi ndalama zawo.

en: It's very easy to sound natural in your own native language, and very easy to sound unnatural in your non-native language.
ny: N'zosavuta kwambiri kumveka zachilengedwe m'chinenero chanu, komanso zosavuta kwambiri kumveka zosakhala zachilengedwe m'chinenero chanu chosakhala chachibadwidwe.

en: The difference between the right word and almost the right word is the difference between lightning and the lightning bug.
ny: Kusiyana pakati pa mawu oyenera ndi pafupifupi mawu oyenera ndi kusiyana pakati pa mphezi ndi kachilombo ka mphezi.

en: Your English is grammatically correct, but sometimes what you say just doesn't sound like what a native speaker would say.
ny: Chingerezi chanu ndi cholondola galamala, koma nthawi zina zomwe mumanena zimangomveka ngati zomwe wokamba nkhani wakwawo anganene.

en: I have Japanese and Chinese friends who speak to each other in English since that is the only language they have in common.
ny: Ndili ndi anzanga a ku Japan ndi Chitchaina omwe amalankhulana m'Chingelezi popeza ndi chinenero chokha chimene ali nacho chofanana.

en: All the doctors say that I shouldn't drink coffee, but, despite that, I do have a bit now and then when I'm in good company.
ny: Madokotala onse amanena kuti sindiyenera kumwa khofi, koma, ngakhale zili choncho, ndimakhala ndi pang'ono tsopano ndi nthawi pamene ndili pa kampani yabwino.

en: Make a good translation of the sentence that you are translating. Don't let translations into other languages influence you.
ny: Pangani matembenuzidwe abwino a chiganizo chimene mukumasulira. Musalole kuti matembenuzidwe a m'zinenero zina akusonkhezereni.

en: One thing I don't like about the iPad is that you can't easily install apps that aren't available through Apple's App Store.
ny: Chinthu chimodzi chomwe sindimakonda za iPad ndikuti simungathe kukhazikitsa mosavuta mapulogalamu omwe sapezeka kudzera pa Apple's App Store.

en: Jingle Bells, a popular song around Christmas time, is not really a Christmas song. The lyrics say nothing about Christmas.
ny: Jingle Bells, nyimbo yotchuka kuzungulira nthawi ya Khirisimasi, si nyimbo ya Khirisimasi kwenikweni. Mawuwo samanena chilichonse chokhudza Khirisimasi.

en: I used to watch this anime a lot when I was a kid, but I can't quite remember what happened to the hero in the final episode.
ny: Ndinkakonda kuonera anime iyi kwambiri pamene ndinali mwana, koma sindikukumbukira kwenikweni zomwe zinachitikira ngwazi mu gawo lomaliza.

en: If your company primarily does business with America, then you should be studying English with a native speaker from America.
ny: Ngati kampani yanu makamaka imachita bizinesi ndi America, ndiye kuti muyenera kuphunzira Chingerezi ndi wokamba nkhani wakwawo wochokera ku America.

en: The English language is undoubtedly the easiest and at the same time the most efficient means of international communication.
ny: Chilankhulo cha Chingerezi mosakayikira ndi chophweka komanso nthawi yomweyo njira yabwino kwambiri yolankhulana padziko lonse.

en: Instead of giving each other Christmas presents this year, we donated the amount we would have spent on presents to a charity.
ny: M'malo mopatsana mphatso za Khirisimasi chaka chino, tinapereka ndalama zimene tikanawononga pa mphatso ku gulu lopereka chithandizo.

en: Singer and actress Selena Gomez started her career at age seven on the children's public television show "Barney and Friends."
ny: Woimba komanso wosewera Selena Gomez anayamba ntchito yake ali ndi zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri pa TV ya ana "Barney ndi Anzanu."

en: A good newspaper reporter takes advantage of what he learns from any source, even the "little bird told him so" type of source.
ny: Mtolankhani wabwino wa nyuzipepala amatenga mwayi pa zomwe amaphunzira kuchokera ku gwero lililonse, ngakhale "mbalame yaing'ono inamuuza choncho" mtundu wa gwero.

en: Food prices are at their highest level since the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization began keeping records in 1990.
ny: Mitengo ya chakudya ili pamlingo wapamwamba kwambiri kuyambira pamene bungwe la United Nations la Food and Agriculture Organization linayamba kusunga zolemba mu 1990.

en: I've heard that it's impossible to sound like a native speaker unless one starts speaking the language before the age of twelve.
ny: Ndamva kuti n'zosatheka kumveka ngati wokamba nkhani wakwawo pokhapokha wina atayamba kulankhula chinenerocho asanakwanitse zaka khumi ndi ziwiri.

en: No matter what your profession, or how happy you may be in it, there are moments when you wish you had chosen some other career.
ny: Ziribe kanthu kuti ntchito yanu ndi yotani, kapena kuti mungakhale osangalala bwanji, pali nthawi zina pamene mukukhumba kuti mukanasankha ntchito ina.

en: When Tom was a kid, he used to collect his father's cigarette butts until he had enough tobacco to roll a cigarette for himself.
ny: Pamene Tom anali mwana, ankakonda kusonkhanitsa ndudu za bambo ake mpaka atakhala ndi fodya wokwanira kuti adzigubuduzike ndudu.

en: Satellite imagery is being used in an effort to narrow down the area in the Indian Ocean where floating debris has been observed.
ny: Zithunzi za satellite zikugwiritsidwa ntchito pofuna kuchepetsa dera la m'nyanja ya Indian Ocean kumene zinyalala zoyandama zawonedwa.

en: Honey, I know the budget is tight, but do you think we could splurge a bit and have a night out at a fancy restaurant this weekend?
ny: Uchi, ine ndikudziwa bajeti ndi zolimba, koma mukuganiza ife tikhoza splurge pang'ono ndi kukhala usiku kunja pa odyera zapamwamba mlungu uno?

en: Tom went to a fortune teller at the town fair and was told that someone would come into his life whose first name started with "M".
ny: Tom anapita kwa wolosera zam'tsogolo pachiwonetsero cha tawuni ndipo anauzidwa kuti wina adzabwera m'moyo wake yemwe dzina lake loyamba linayamba ndi "M".

en: A committee is a group of people who individually can do nothing, but who, as a group, can meet and decide that nothing can be done.
ny: Komiti ndi gulu la anthu omwe payekha sangachite chilichonse, koma omwe, monga gulu, angakumane ndikusankha kuti palibe chomwe chingachitidwe.

en: Oh, sure, I studied English in my school days. But it wasn't until two or three years ago that I really started taking it seriously.
ny: O, ndithudi, ndinaphunzira Chingelezi m'masiku anga a sukulu. Koma zaka ziwiri kapena zitatu zapitazo ndi pamene ndinayambadi kuzitenga mwamphamvu.

en: In 1964, Roger Miller agreed to record sixteen songs. One of those songs was "Dang Me." It became his first number one selling record.
ny: Mu 1964, Roger Miller anavomera kujambula nyimbo khumi ndi zisanu ndi chimodzi. Imodzi mwa nyimbo zimenezo inali "Dang Me." Inakhala mbiri yake yoyamba yogulitsa nambala imodzi.

en: Tom hadn't washed clothes in a long time, so he searched through his dirty clothes to see if there was something clean enough to wear.
ny: Tom anali asanatsuke zovala kwa nthawi yaitali, choncho anafufuza zovala zake zauve kuti aone ngati pali chinachake choyera chokwanira kuvala.

en: One way to lower the number of errors in the Tatoeba Corpus would be to encourage people to only translate into their native languages.
ny: Njira imodzi yochepetsera chiwerengero cha zolakwa mu Tatoeba Corpus ingakhale kulimbikitsa anthu kuti azingomasulira m'zinenero zawo.

en: I want a religion that respects the differences that exist between people and that states that each individual has their own personality.
ny: Ndikufuna chipembedzo chomwe chimalemekeza kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu ndipo chimanena kuti munthu aliyense ali ndi umunthu wake.

en: She has a boyfriend she's been going out with since high school, but she feels their relationship is in a rut, so she's become discontented.
ny: Iye ali ndi chibwenzi chomwe wakhala akupita nacho kuyambira kusekondale, koma akuona kuti ubale wawo uli m'mavuto, choncho wakhala wosakhutira.

en: Always use distilled water in steam irons because using ordinary water will cause a mineral build-up over time that will clog the steam holes.
ny: Nthawi zonse gwiritsani ntchito madzi osungunula mu zitsulo za nthunzi chifukwa kugwiritsa ntchito madzi wamba kudzapangitsa kuti mchere umangidwe pakapita nthawi yomwe idzatseka mabowo a nthunzi.

en: I think it's a shame that some foreign language teachers were able to graduate from college without ever having studied with a native speaker.
ny: Ndikuganiza kuti n'zomvetsa chisoni kuti aphunzitsi ena a chinenero chachilendo anatha kumaliza maphunziro ku koleji popanda kuphunzira ndi wokamba nkhani wakwawo.

en: You can fool some of the people all of the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you can't fool all of the people all of the time.
ny: Mukhoza kupusitsa ena mwa anthu nthawi zonse, ndi anthu onse nthawi zina, koma simungathe kupusitsa anthu onse nthawi zonse.

en: If you translate from your second language into your own native language, rather than the other way around, you're less likely to make mistakes.
ny: Ngati mumamasulira kuchokera m'chinenero chanu chachiwiri m'chinenero chanu, m'malo mwa njira ina, simungathe kulakwitsa.

en: People speak so much about the need for leaving a better planet for our children, and forget the urgency of leaving better children for our planet.
ny: Anthu amalankhula zambiri za kufunika kosiya pulaneti labwino kwa ana athu, ndipo amaiwala kufulumira kwa kusiya ana abwino ku pulaneti lathu.

en: The Australian Prime Minister has said that he does not intend to engage in megaphone diplomacy with Egypt over the jailing of an Australian journalist.
ny: Nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Australia yanena kuti sakufuna kuchita nawo ubale wa megaphone ndi Egypt chifukwa cha kumangidwa kwa mtolankhani wa ku Australia.

en: You may not learn to speak as well as a native speaker, but you should be able to speak well enough that native speakers will understand what you have to say.
ny: Mwina simungaphunzire kulankhula komanso wokamba nkhani wakwawo, koma muyenera kukhala wokhoza kulankhula bwino mokwanira kuti olankhula mbadwa adzamvetsetsa zomwe mukufuna kunena.
